title: v1.6.3.4-v12 Restore Fixes
details:
v1.6.3.4-v12 implemented fixes for 6 diagnostic issues:

1. Storage Corruption: Enhanced logging with transaction sequencing, pendingWriteCount tracking
2. Manager List Clears: _safeClearRenderedTabs() now verifies DOM before clearing, blocks if tabs exist
3. Position/Size Updates: UpdateHandler._checkDOMExists() added, logs when skipping updates
4. Duplicate Quick Tabs: _findDOMElementById() and _tryRecoverWindowFromDOM() reuse existing windows
5. Yellow Indicator: MinimizedManager.validateStateConsistency() and clearSnapshotAtomic() added
6. Missing Logging: Enhanced logging throughout storage-utils, UICoordinator, UpdateHandler, MinimizedManager

Key patterns:
- userInitiated parameter for _safeClearRenderedTabs (defaults to false for backward compat)
- _verifyAllTabsDOMDetached() checks if all tabs have detached DOM
- Recovery uses domElement.__quickTabWindow if set by window.js
